title: Is it in any way possible to get unlimited upload time on Soundcloud for free? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. You have to buy a higher premium if you'd like to upload more, otherwise, you have to create a new account. It’s really not that expensive to buy more upload time, so I'd encourage you to do that. You say you have no money, but that just implies you're a) underage w/o a job; or b) of age and don't have a job or good AMT of income; or c) just don't want to spend the money on SoundCloud — which is dumb. If you can't pony up the measly amount of money for a service that provides a great free service, and you're apt to complain about it, then I encourage you not to use it at all.

As you can see to open multiple accounts is a common behaviour on Soundcloud but.. don’t do this since it is against Soundcoud’s Terms of Use - Listen to music. If you produce tekno, hardcore, dnb, dubstep, acid, psy or some underground music you are welcome on Free Sounds: 10GB space for each one, FOR FREE! http://sound.freeundergroundtekno.org
